.Operations.CGR@chalhoub.com>; Nasser Alblooshi <Nasser.Alblooshi@chalhoub.com>; Aaiza Zafar <Aaiza.Zafar@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RE: RSO (UAE) - NEW STORE RE-OPENING | (Tumi Pop up - Dubai Mall ) 
 

Dear All, 

 

It is our pleasure to announce the opening of TUMI Pop UP DM Boutique â€“ Dubai Mall.

 

The boutique team started welcoming its Guests on the 26th of Sep at 10 am.

 

Another amazing teamwork from all teams members involved in this project :
